title: Is Huawei the only 5G equipment manufacturer? - Quora

response.answer_text: It certainly is one of the leading companies but not the only one. Apart from global giants like Huawei, Nokia, Ericsson, there are many other emerging companies. I came across a company by the name of VVDN Technologies(based out of India) which promises to be an emerging company in 5G. Recently they collaborated with STL for the manufacturing of 5G solutions. STL, VVDN Technologies join hands to develop and manufacture 5G Solutions Source: Manufacturing India These guys also expanded their RF engineering expertise in 5G space to provide end to end facility of developing Macro RUs, SmallCells & FemtoCells. Macro RUs, SmallCells & FemtoCells development with VVDN’s 5G RF engineering expertise Happy read :)

No. There are plenty of them. Nokia has the broadest portfolio. Ericsson is strongest in radio access. Huawei is cheapest because heavily subsidised by China government. Why China communist party is supporting them is the question you should ask.
